body:
Hey everyone, I'm so happy and grateful for the positive feedback on my trailer video for Nebula, but there were a few issues too :/ 
I got a few mentions about the lag and watermarks and in reply to EVERYONE i'd just like to say that remember: This is my very first video! NOBODY can make a perfect video first attempt, and i gave it my best, BUT there will be fixes. In the entire series there will be NO watermarks and extremely little if not, NO lag, so please bear with me :)

Also please hit that like and subscribe button on the channel
Thank you all for the support - OPTOBAT

Link to trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ad0ID1R2iak
